ing: 4 Granny Smith apple, cored and sliced
des: "This is the best apple dip ever... You can use either regular toffee chips or chocolate toffee chips, either way is yummy!"
ins: Beat together the cream cheese, brown and white sugars, and vanilla extract in a bowl until smooth. Stir in toffee bits. Pour the lime and lemon juices over the sliced apples to prevent browning. Serve dip with the apples on the side.
